Jobs.title: MultiSecure Product Manager
Jobs.description: ', '    Managing two of Ubizen Softwares high-volume products on a worldwide level, MultiSecure® DMZ/Shield and MultiSecure® Trusted/Channel. In charge of the development of the product and single point of contact towards the sales force, marketing department, legal department, partner channel, product support services, training centre and technical writing.', '

summary: ', '    I started my career in the Media/Movie-theatre sector, where I was involved in the introduction of new technologies, like Internet, e-ticketing and e-business. After this I joined the Ubizen (aka Netvision, Cybertrust and Verizon) company where I continued my career starting as a pre-sales consultant/engineer. Two years later I was promoted to technical product manager of two high-volume security products, which were developed in-house by Ubizen. As a technical product manager I managed a team of more than twenty persons, both commercially and technically skilled. After being a technical product manager at Ubizen for more than two years, I joined the Ascure company as an Information Security Consultant and Coach mainly working on Information Security Governance, Operational Risk Management and Security Management. Today I am also part of the management of Ascure, managing the business unit Ascure Academy and acting as COO (together with my team we are responsible for the day2day operations of Ascure). I have a consultancy and management background in networking and security applications disciples and have engaged in several major and medium security and related projects throughout my career. I have the following certifications EMBIS, CISM, CISSP and CISA. Recently I have been appointed as CEO of a new company, called BCM Academy Belgium (more information can be found on www.bcmacademy.be).', '
